name: LingView
description: For presentation of audio/video/text corpus of texts. Previously using code from [ETST](http://community.village.virginia.edu/etst/).

scripts.bundle: shx rm -rf bundle/ && shx mkdir -p bundle && shx cp -r index.html build/ css/ images/ bundle/ && shx cp -r data bundle/data
scripts.quick-build-online: npm run rebuild-db-online && npm run webpack && echo "Done! index.html is ready. To bundle LingView, run "npm run bundle"."
scripts.quick-build-offline: npm run rebuild-db-offline && npm run webpack && echo "Done! index.html is ready. To bundle LingView, run "npm run bundle"."
scripts.quick-build: node preprocessing/rebuild.js && npm run webpack && echo "Done! index.html is ready. To bundle LingView, run \"npm run bundle\"."
scripts.watch-and-serve: npm run quick-build && concurrently -k "chokidar 'data/**/*' -c 'npm run quick-build' --initial --silent --debounce 500" "http-server ./ -p 3000 -c-1"
